# About Open Source Communities

## Our Mission

The Open Source Communities database aims to connect and highlight vibrant open source ecosystems globally. We believe in fostering collaboration, knowledge sharing, and community building within open source communities.

## Project Goals

- Create a comprehensive directory of open source communities
- Facilitate connections between communities and contributors
- Promote open source culture and collaboration
- Document the growth and impact of open source globally

## Team

This project is maintained by a group of open source enthusiasts. We welcome contributions from anyone interested in supporting open source communities.

## Acknowledgments

We would like to thank all the communities and contributors who have helped build this database. Your participation makes this project possible.
